roleset.name: try to get a role
roleset.note: AUDITION-V NOTES: Arg2 seems rarer, to me. (from audition.01-v)
AUDITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, audition-v.01. No VNcls. (from audition.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Well, they can now go and audition there.

example.name: all args
example.text: John auditioned with the local community theatre for the role of Bottom.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Personally , I never hear where auditions for Idol will be held , but maybe I 'm not paying attention to that since I would n't qualify , and I do n't live near a city where auditions might take place .

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: For his audition with Murray Campbell, Jack was to play Ray Brown's solo 'One Bass Hit'.

roleset.name: able to be heard
roleset.note: AUDIBLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED (from audible.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Phil made sure to yell loud enough so that he was audible to his friends
